exercises.name: Planks
exercises.raw: Planks: 3 sets x 20 (60) sec x Bodyweight

exercises.name: Seated Row
exercises.notes: toes on the tape and heels on the ground, knees slightly bent, lean back 20 degrees and squeeze between your shoulder blades when you pull back
exercises.raw: Seated Row: 1 set  x 15 reps x 75 lbs,  2 sets x 10-12 (15) x 87.5 : 30 sec rest ( toes on the tape and heels on the ground, knees slightly bent, lean back 20 degrees and squeeze between your shoulder blades when you pull back)

exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.notes: bring legs down to 90 degrees , when you push up come close but DON’T lock out knees… push through your heels
exercises.raw: #28: Leg Press: adj#4 : 1 set   x (15) reps x 90 lbs , 2 sets x 10 (15) reps x 120 lbs : 1 min rest ( bring legs down to 90 degrees , when you push up come close but DON’T lock out knees… push through your heels)

exercises.name: Seated Shoulder Press
exercises.raw: #10: Seated Shoulder Press: adj#7: 1 set x 15 reps x 50 lbs, 2 sets  x 12-15 reps x 60 lbs, … 30 sec rest ( look back, push back)

exercises.name: Leg Ext
exercises.raw: #4:Leg Ext: asj#3/6: 3 sets x 12 (15) reps x 50 lbs: 45 sec rest

exercises.name: Close Grip Lat Pull
exercises.notes: sit straight up and pull the bar to your collarbone, keep abs   tight as you pull down
exercises.raw: #24: Close Grip Lat Pull: adj#2: 2 sets  x 15 reps x 80 lbs, 2 sets x 15 lbs x 90 lbs 30 sec rest : ( sit straight up and pull the bar to your collarbone, keep abs   tight as you pull down)

exercises.name: Bicycle abs
exercises.raw: Bicycle abs: 3 sets x 20 (60) sec x Bodyweight

exercises.name: Leg Curls
exercises.raw: #5: Leg Curls: adj#5 : 3 sets  x 10 (12) reps x 30 lbs: 45 sec rest

exercises.name: Standing Dumbbell Bicep I’s to T’s Curls
exercises.raw: Standing Dumbbell Bicep I’s to T’s Curls: 3 sets x  (15) reps x 15 lbs : standing w/  feet shoulder width apart and knees slightly bent, turn palms up when you curl the weights up)

exercises.name: Calf raises
exercises.raw: Calf raises : 3 sets x 12 (15) reps x Bodyweight
